ComicInfo.Series: Dark Tower: The Gunslinger - The Man in Black
ComicInfo.Summary: Roland and Jake pursue The Man In Black into the Cyclopean Mountains where they find the ruins of a civilisation similar to that of Jake's homeworld (New York City). The tunnels are treacherous and full of mutants that answer to Roland's enemy but he will stop at nothing to achieve his goal regardless of who may be hurt along the way.
ComicInfo.Tags: Eddie Dean,Roland Deschain,Allie,Steven Deschain,Alain Johns,Mid-World,Jake Chambers,Oy,Gilead,Cyclopean Mountains,Randall Flagg,Gabrielle Deschain
